question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. person in white sweater
B. stainless steel scale
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The stainless steel scale is in the foreground, directly in front of the person in the white sweater, making its position clearly closer to the camera.
